newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egyptian pound averages 3.3933/3.3960 to dlr.
newsitem.headline: Egyptian pound averages 3.3933/3.3960 to dlr.

text.p: Private-sector Egyptian banks said the dollar ranged from 3.3920 to 3.3940 Egyptian pounds bid and 3.3950 to 3.3970 offer in the interbank market on Sunday.
One banker quoted 3.3900 bid and 3.3960 offer but did not deal.
A survey of three actively trading banks gave average rates of 3.3933 pounds bid and 3.3960 offered. The averages compared to 3.3934 pounds bid and 3.3957 pounds offered on Thursday.
The Central Bank calculated the average exchange rate at midday (1000 GMT) as 3.393645 buy and 3.398237 sell.
